OOC: Yeah, we know you'll never give up, Dewboy, that's why we're all cryin=
g.

To RoboRick: I can hang around for a while, but I don't know how much l=
onger I can hang around not doing anything...

  ----- Original Message ---=
--
  From: Kyle Stewart
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Thursday, May =
09, 2002 12:27 PM
  Subject: Re: Autobots, roll out... Perhaps for the last=
 time... THE END IS NEAR...


  I on the other hand will NEVER give up.  Al=
though I
  wish Tankor would post for Cheetah, or whoever has him
  for Meg=
atron.

  --- Hollywood Narrator <thecode@...> wrote:
  > And so, r=
ealizing that he has failed to make a
  > successful comeback in NBW, the H=
ollywood Narrator
  > decides that retirement might be the best solution.
 =
 > He has no regrets, other than that he just couldn't
  > hold onto his sp=
ot in the NBW like he wanted to. His
  > posts, this one included, have los=
t all of their
  > life and energy. He degenerates rapidly, and
  > althoug=
h he is not a bad RPer, like he once was, he
  > feels that he is not up to=
 par with alot of other
  > people. He is clueless, he does not know what i=
s
  > going on with the RPG and does not know what to do
  > with his chara=
cters. He feels he had a pretty good
  > run, and at one point was almost o=
n top. He had
  > nearly the greatest number of all time characters in
  > =
the RPG's history, and his characters actually,
  > although through gan gr=
ape (Get it?), destroyed one
  > of the Predacon bases. He has not always b=
een easy
  > to work with. He's complained, he's challenged
  > things, he'=
s argued with the highest of people,
  > because he worked hard to protect =
what he had
  > already established. But now, nobody misses the
  > Hollywo=
od Narrator's posts. Nobody is interested in
  > trying to do storylines wi=
th the aging veteran.
  > Before the character limit, he was promising. Aft=
er
  > the limit happened, he just seemed to float off into
  > space, not =
able to have fun with his limited cast.
  > Should the Hollywood Narrator l=
eave? Maybe that
  > should be for the RPG to decide. I am in a sad state
 =
 > with NBW right now...
  >
  --------------------------------------------=
------------------------------------------
  > New, New, New World Order! 4=
 life! 4 life!
  > 
  > Watcha gonna do when HulkaMania runs wild on you!?
